argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_1z | |- 1 e. ZZ |
| 2 |  | #P_gcdcom | |- ( ( 1 e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( 1 gcd M ) = ( M gcd 1 ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( 1 gcd M ) = ( M gcd 1 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_gcd1 | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( M gcd 1 ) = 1 ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( 1 gcd M ) = 1 ) |
